name: Towntate
description:
Build your Town from scratch!  //  Liluo website: https://liluo.io/regalroyale/towntate

Buy properties to make them your own and generate funds. (It is highly recommended to get the farms ASAP)

Generate enough funds and donate them through the church. Tap on ❤️ to see leaderboards.

The highest fund donators will be featured in the leaderboards.

NOTE:  This game was built keeping the time limit of the game jam in mind and hence the save functionality isn't currently implemented. You may have to start over if you refresh the site. You may encounter bugs 🪲. Feedbacks Appreciated. Other than that, have fun. 😊

Info:

Funds are generated every 30 seconds. Half of  income per minute is generated each time.
